tags.name: holy-grail
tags.description: Provides an extended "Holy Grail" layout as a web component.

slots.name: header
slots.description: Topmost horizontal slot, as wide as the whole element, as high as its content.

slots.name: top-nav
slots.description: A horizontal slot above the "main" slot, as wide as the "main" slot, as high as its content.

slots.name: main
slots.description: A large slot in the middle of the element, fills the rest of width and height of the element.

slots.name: bottom-nav
slots.description: A horizontal slot below the "main" slot, as wide as the "main" slot, as high as its content.

slots.name: start-side
slots.description: A vertical slot on the left side(in the left-to-right text-writing direction) with an explicit width (25% of the element by default), as high as the content between the "header" and "footer" slots. The width can be customised by a style using the part "start-side" in the selector.

slots.name: end-side
slots.description: A vertical slot on the right side (in the left-to-right text-writing direction) with an explicit width (25% of the element by default), as high as the content between the "header" and "footer" slots. The width can be customised by a style using the part "end-side" in the selector.

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Bottommost horizontal slot, as wide as the whole element, as high as its content.
